inclusion.criterion: Documented diagnosis of WG according to American College of Rheumatology (ACR) and Chapel Hill Consensus Conference (CHCC) definition
inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: Transbronchial biopsy revealed necrotic granulomas with multinucleated giant cells

inclusion.label: met
inclusion.evidence: His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4 since the beginning of his disease.

inclusion.criterion: Total disease duration >= 3 months treated with CYC or >= 6 months with MTX
inclusion.label: not_met

inclusion.criterion: ALT, bilirubin and alkaline phosphatase levels within 2x the upper limits of normal
inclusion.label: unknown

inclusion.criterion: Documented to be non-pregnant by serum/urine pregnancy test
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willing to participate in this study
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Participation in another clinical research study
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Pregnant or nursing mothers and women of childbearing age not using appropriate contraception
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Clear evidence of active disease due to bacteria/viral infection
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Patient has an unacceptable risk for participation in a study of immunosuppressive therapy
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: History of substance abuse or psychotic disorders
exclusion.label: not_met
